name: Realistic AI
description: Makes the AI smarter, more realistic and more attentive in Master mode.

options.name: Normal
options.tooltip: The base version of Realistic AI; more realistic than vanilla.

options.name: Manhunt
options.tooltip: Guards now set up Manhunts, in which a large area of the map is searched, centred at your last known position.

options.name: Extreme
options.tooltip: Increases everything to ridiculous levels, past the point of realism. Everyone now has precognition and knows exactly what you're doing.
